evidence: Single package structure with clear module separation (website_actions package containing multiple specialized modules)
Abstract base class (WebsiteActions) defining interface for different website implementations
High fan-out (4.33) indicating centralized coordination logic in Downloader class
Directory depth of 2 shows organized but not deeply nested structure
Multiple concrete implementations of abstract interface following polymorphic pattern
Main entry point (main.py) delegating to central Downloader class
risks: Tight coupling through direct imports between modules
Potential for growing complexity as more website implementations are added
Single package structure may not scale well with increasing functionality
